1.verse: UPawulos noTimoti, abakhonzi bakaYesu Kristu, babhalela bonke abangcwele abakuKristu Yesu, abaseFilipi, ndawonye nabaveleli nabalungiseleli;

2.verse: bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo, oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

3.verse: Ndihlala ndibulela kuye uThixo wam, ekunikhumbuleni kwam konke

4.verse: (ekukhungeni kwam konke ndikhunga ngenxa yenu nonke,  ndivuyile),

5.verse: ngenxa yobudlelane benu obubhekisele kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo, kususela kwimini yokuqala kude kube ngoku;

6.verse: ekubeni ndikholose ngayo le nto, yokuba lowo wawuqalayo ngaphakathi kwenu umsebenzi olungileyo, wowufeza, ide ibe yiloo mini kaYesu Kristu;

7.verse: njengokuba ndilungisa ukucinga oko ngani nonke, ngenxa yokuba nikum entliziyweni, nithe, nasezintanjeni zam,  nasekuziphenduleleni kwam, nasekuziqiniseni kwam iindaba ezilungileyo, naba ngamadlelana nam ngobabalo olu, nina nonke.

8.verse: Kuba uThixo ulingqina lam lokuba kukhulu ukunilangazelela kwam nonke, ndineemfesane zikaYesu Kristu.

9.verse: Nako oku ndiya kuthandazela, ukuba uthando lwenu lube kukhona luphuphuma ngokuphuphuma ukwazi okukhulu, nako konke ukuqonda,

10.verse: ukuze nizicikide izinto eziziincamisa, ukuze nibe nokusulungeka, ningabi nasiwo, nide nise kwimini kaKristu;

11.verse: nizele ziziqhamo zobulungisa ezingoYesu Kristu,  nikhangelise ekuzukiseni nasekudumiseni uThixo.

12.verse: Ke kaloku ndinga ningazi, bazalwana, ukuba izinto ezindihleleyo, zibethe kwakukhona zihambayo iindaba ezilungileyo;

13.verse: ngokokude iintambo zam ezi zibonakale kuyo yonke indlu yomkhosi nakwabanye bonke, ukuba zikuKristu;

14.verse: baze abona bazalwana baninzi bathi, beseNkosini, bekholose ngeentambo zam ezi, babe kukhona benobuganga bokulithetha ilizwi, bengenakoyika.

15.verse: Okunene abathile bamvakalisa uKristu ngomona neenkani,  abanye ke bamvakalisa ngokokuzithandela.

16.verse: Abeyelenqe abo bamazisa uKristu ngokungenyulu, beba baya kongezelela imbandezelo kwiintambo zam;

17.verse: ke aba, benziwa luthando, bamazisa wKristu besazi ukuba ndimiselwe ukuziphendulela iindaba ezilungileyo.

18.verse: Ibe yini ke? Noko kunjalo, ngeendlela zonke, nokuba kungokunyhwalaza, nokuba kungenyaniso, kwaziswa uKristu.  Ndiyavuya kuko oko, ndaye ndisaya kuvuya.

19.verse: Kuba ndiyazi ukuba oku kuya kuphumelela ekusindisweni kwam,  ngako ukundikhungela kwenu, nangoncedo loMoya kaYesu Kristu;

20.verse: kuye ngokulangazelela nangokuthemba kwam, ukuba andiyi kudaniswa nganto; uya kusuka ngako konke ukungafihlisi,  njengokwamaxesha onke, athi nangoku enziwe mkhulu uKristu emzimbeni wam, nokuba na kungobomi, nokuba kungokufa.

21.verse: Kuba kum mna, ukudla ubomi kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo.

22.verse: Ke ukuba ukudla ubomi ndisenyameni kusisiqhamo somsebenzi kum oko, into ke endonyula yona andiyazi.

23.verse: Kuba ndixinekile phakathi kwezinto ezimbini; ndinawo umnqweno wokunga ndinganduluka, ndiye kuba noKristu; kuba kokona kulungileyo kakhulu oko;

24.verse: kodwa ukuhlala ndihleli ndisenyameni, yeyona nto ifunekayo ngenxa yenu.

25.verse: Kananjalo, ndikholose ngoko nje, ndiyazi ukuba ndiya kuhlala ndihlale, ndihleli nani nonke, ukuze nihambele phambili, nivuyiswe lukholo;

26.verse: ukuze iqhayiya lenu kuKristu Yesu ngam liye lisanda ngokwanda, ngako ukubuya ndibekho kuni.

27.verse: Kodwa ke ukuhlala kwenu makube kokuzifaneleyo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, ukuze, nokuba ndifikile ndanibona,  nokuba andifikanga, ndizive iindaba zenu, ukuba nimi moyeni mnye, ngamphefumlo mnye, nilwela inkolo yeendaba ezilungileyo,

28.verse: ningothuswa nantweni-nye ngabo bachasayo; into ke leyo engumbonakalaliso wentshabalalo okunene kubo, kodwa ingumbonakalaliso wosindiso kuni, kube ke oko kuvela kuThixo.

29.verse: Ngokuba nababalwa ukuthi, ngenxa kaKristu, ninganeli kukholwa kuye; nababalwa nokuva ubunzima ngenxa yakhe,

30.verse: ninawo umzamo onjengalowo nawubonayo kum, nangoku niwuvayo ukuba ukho kum.

1.verse: Ukuba ke ngoko kukho usizo kuKristu, ukuba kukho ukhuzo lothando, ukuba kukho ubudlelane boMoya,

2.verse: ukuba kukho imfesane neemfefe, luzaliseni uvuyo lwam, ukuze nicinge nto-nye, ninaluthando lunye, ninamphefumlo mnye,  nicinga nto-nye;

3.verse: ningenzi nanye into ngokweyelenqe, nangokozuko olulambathayo. Yithini ngokuthobeka kwentliziyo omnye ambalele omnye ekuthini nguyena wongamileyo kunaye.

4.verse: Makangathi elowo axunele kwezakhe izinto zodwa, elowo makaxunele nakwezabanye.

5.verse: Yibani nale ngcinga kuni, wayenayo kuye uKristu Yesu:

6.verse: yena wathi, esebumeni bukaThixo, akathi ukulingana kwakhe oku noThixo kulixhoba;

7.verse: usuke wazihluba, wathabatha ubume bomkhonzi, enziwe wafana nabantu;

8.verse: wathi ngemo efunyenwe enjengomntu, wazithoba, waba ngolulamileyo, wada wesa ekufeni, ukufa ke kwasemnqamlezweni.

9.verse: Kungoko athe uThixo wamphakamisa kakhulu, wamnika igama elingaphezu kwawo onke amagama;

10.verse: ukuze ngegama likaYesu onke amadolo agobe,  awabasemazulwini, nawabasemhlabeni, nawabaphantsi komhlaba;

11.verse: zithi zonke iilwimi zixele ukuba uYesu Kristu uyiNkosi,  kuze kuzukiswe uThixo uYise.

12.verse: Ngoko ke, zintanda zam, njengokuba nahlala ninokuva,  lusebenzeni nilufeze olwenu usindiso, ninokuzoyikela nokungcangcazela; ningangi nenjenjalo xa ndikhoyo kodwa, manibe kukhona nenjenjalo Xa ndingekhoyo.

13.verse: Kuba nguThixo okusebenzayo Ngaphakathi kwenu ukuthanda oko,  kwanokusebenza oko, ngenxa yenkolelo yakhe.

15.verse: ukuze nibe ngabangenakusoleka, abangenabuqhinga; nibe ngabantwana bakaThixo abangenakubekwa bala esazulwini sesizukulwana esigoso, esigwenxa; enithi phakathi kwabo nibonakale ninjengezikhanyiso ehlabathini, nibambelele elizwini lobomi;

16.verse: nibe liqhayiya lam, nide nise kwimini kaKristu, ukuba andifumananga ndabaleka, kanjalo andifumananga ndabulaleka.

17.verse: Ewe, nokuba ndiyathululwa ngokomnikelo phezu kombingelelo nombuso wokholo lwenu, ndiyavuya, ndivuyisana nani nonke.

18.verse: Yithini ke ngokoko nani nivuye, nivuyisane nam.

19.verse: Ke kaloku ndithembele eNkosini uYesu, ukuba ndonithumela uTimoti kamsinya, ukuze nam ndonwabe, ndakuzazi iindawo ezingani.

20.verse: Kuba andinamntu wumbi, umphefumlo uvana nowam, owothi ayikhathalele ngokwenyaniso imicimbi engani.

21.verse: Kuba bonke bafuna ezabo izinto, zingezizo ezikaYesu Kristu.

22.verse: Ukucikideka ke kwakhe niyakwazi: ukuba wathi, njengomntwana kuyise, wakhonza kunye nam kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo.

23.verse: Lowo ke ngoko ndithembe ukumthuma kwaoko, xa ndithe ndayiqonda imicimbi engam.

24.verse: Ke ndikholose ngeNkosi, ukuba nam ngokwam ndoza kamsinya.

25.verse: Kodwa ke ndibe kuyafuneka ukuba ndinithumele uEpafrodito,  umzalwana wam osebenza nam, umphumi-mkhosi nam, umthunywa wenu ke, umlungiseleli wam kwiintswelo zam;

26.verse: ekubeni ke ebenilangazelela nina nonke, edandatheka, ngenxa enokuba nevayo ukuba wayesifa.

27.verse: Kuba okunene wayesifa, ephantse ukufa. Ke uThixo wamenzela inceba; akenzela yena yedwa, wenzela nam lo, ukuze ndingabi buhlungu, ndibuhlungu kade.

28.verse: Kukhona ngoko ndimthuma ngokukhawuleza, ukuze nithi nakumbona nibuye nivuye, kuthi nokwam ukuba buhlungu kudambe.

29.verse: Mamkeleni ke ngokwaseNkosini, ninovuyo lonke; nibabeke abo banjalo;

30.verse: ngokuba, ngenxa yomsebenzi kaKristu, wada waphantsa ukufa,  ebenza isichenge ubomi bakhe, ukuze enzelelele ukusilela kwenu ekundilungiseleleni.

1.verse: Elokugqiba, bazalwana bam, vuyani niseNkosini. Ukunibhalela kwaezo zinto akunqenekile okunene kum, ke nina kuyaninqabisa.

2.verse: Zilumkeleni izinja, balumkeleni abasebenzi beento ezimbi,  balumkeleni aborhunulo.

3.verse: Kuba abolwaluko sithi, thina bakhonza uThixo ngomoya,  siqhayise ngoKristu Yesu, singakholosi ngenyama;

4.verse: nakuba mna ndibe ndingakholosayo ngenyama; ukuba kukho bani uba unokukholosa ngenyama, bendingaba ngakumbi mna:

5.verse: ndalukayo ngomhla wesibhozo, ndingowenzala kaSirayeli,  ndingowesizwe sikaBhenjamin, umHebhere wamaHebhere,  ngokomthetho ndingumFarisi,

6.verse: ngokwenzondelelo ndilitshutshisa ibandla, ngokobulungisa obo basemthethweni ndingongenakusoleka.

7.verse: Ndisuke, zona ezo zinto zabe ziyinzuzo kum, zona ezo ndazibalela ekuthini ziyinkxwaleko ngenxa kaKristu.

8.verse: Ewe, okunene, ndisuka izinto zonke ndizibalele ekuthini ziyinkxwaleko, ngenxa yokongama kokumazi uKristu Yesu iNkosi yam; endithe ngenxa yakhe ndonakalelwa zezi zinto zonke,  ndizibalela ekuthini ziyinkunkuma, ukuze ndimzuze uKristu,

9.verse: ndifunyanwe ndikuye, ndingenabo obam ubulungisa, obo basemthethweni; ndinobo bungokukholwa kuKristu, ubulungisa ke obuphuma kuThixo ngalo ukholo;

10.verse: ukuba ndimazi, kwanamandla ovuko lwakhe, nokuba ndibe nobudlelane naye ngeentlungu zakhe, ndifaniswe noko kufa kwakhe;

12.verse: Kungekuko ukuthi sendamkele, nokuthi sendigqibelele; ke ndiphuthuma ukuba ndingakuganga na nokukuganga oko, ndathi nam ndagangelwa khona nguye uKristu Yesu.

13.verse: Bazalwana, mna andizibaleli ekuthini ndigangile; ke ndenza nto-nye: ndithi, ndizilibala izinto ezisemva, ndisolulela kweziphambili,

14.verse: ndiphuthume ngokoxunele umvuzo wobizo lwaphezulu lukaThixo kuKristu Yesu.

15.verse: Ngoko masithi, ngangoko singako thina bagqibeleleyo,  sicinge oko; kanjalo ukuba nicinga into ngokukumbi, uThixo wonityhilela naleyo.

16.verse: Noko ke, apho sifikelele khona, masihambe ngamgca mnye,  masicinge nto-nye.

17.verse: Yibani ngabaxelisa mna, bazalwana, nixunele kubo abahamba ngokunjalo, njengokuba ninomfuziselo, thina aba ke.

18.verse: Kuba baninzi abahambayo, endathetha futhi kuni ngabo, ngoku ke ndithetha ndilila nokulila, ndisithi, bazizo iintshaba zomnqamlezo kaKristu;

19.verse: abasiphelo siyintshabalalo, abaThixo usisisu sabo,  abaluzuko lulihlazo labo, abanyamekela izinto zomhlaba.

20.verse: Kuba thina ikowethu lisemazulwini, apho kananjalo silinde khona kwauMsindisi, iNkosi uYesu Kristu;

21.verse: eya kuwenza kumila kumbi umzimba wokuthobeka kwethu, ukuze wona wenziwe ufane nawo umzimba wozuko lwakhe, ngokokusebenza kwalowo unako ukuzithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.

1.verse: Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam abaziintanda, balangazelelwayo,  luvuyo lwam, sithsaba sam, yimani ngokunjalo eNkosini,  zintanda.

2.verse: UWodiya ndiyamyala, noSintike ndiyamyala, ukuba bacinge nto-nye beseNkosini.

3.verse: Ndiyakucela nawe, sinxulumana senyaniso, bambisana nabo bafazi bazama nam ezindabeni ezilungileyo, kwanoKlemente,  nabanye abasebenzisi bam, abamagama asencwadini yobomi.

4.verse: Vuyani eNkosini amaxesha onke; ndiyaphinda ndithi, Vuyani.

5.verse: Ukuthantamisa kwenu makwazeke kubantu bonke. INkosi ikufuphi.

6.verse: Ningaxhaleli nto; mazithi iingcelo zenu ezintweni zonke,  ngako ukuthandaza nokukhunga, ndawonye nokubulela, zaziswe kuye uThixo.

7.verse: Lwaye uxolo lukaThixo, olugqithisele kuko konke ukuqonda,  luya kuzigcina iintliziyo zenu neengqiqo zenu kuKristu Yesu.

8.verse: Elokugqiba, bazalwana, ndithi, iinto zonke eziyinene, iinto zonke ezindilekileyo, iinto zonke ezibubulungisa, iinto zonke ezinyulu, iinto zonke ezithandekayo, iinto zonke eziludumo lulungileyo, ukuba kukho sidima, ukuba kukho ndumiso,  zithelekeleleni ezo zinto.

9.verse: Kwa-ezo zinto nazifundayo, nazamkela, naziva, nazibona kum,  yenzani zona ezo; waye uThixo woxolo eya kuba nani.

10.verse: Ke kaloku ndaye ndivuya eNkosini kakhulu, ukuba ngoku kokugqibela kude kwathi ukukunyamekela kwenu okwam, kwabuya kwatyatyamba: enaye nikunyamekele okunene, koko ke naniswele ithuba.

11.verse: Kungekuko ukuba ndithetha ngokuswela; kuba mna ndafunda ukuthi entlalweni endikuyo ndanele.

12.verse: Ndiyazana nobuhlwempu, ndiyazana nobutyebi; kuko konke,  nasezintweni zonke, ndiqhelanisiwe nokuhlutha kwanokulamba,  nokutyeba kwanokuswela.

13.verse: Ndinokuzenza izinto zonke, ndikulowo undomelezayo, uKristu.

14.verse: Noko ke natyapha ukuba nobudlelane nam ngembandezelo.

15.verse: Nani ke baseFilipi, niyazi ukuba, ekuqalekeni kweendaba ezilungileyo ezi, xenikweni ndaphumayo kwelaseMakedoni,  akubangakho nalinye ibandla eladlelana nam, ngokusingisele emcimbini wokunikela nowokwamkela, yaba nini nedwa.

16.verse: Ngokuba, naseTesalonika, kwaba kanye nakabini nithumela,  nindinceda ekusweleni kwam.

17.verse: Ingekuko ukuba ndibe ndifuna ukuphiwa; ikukuba ndibe ndifuna isiqhamo esandela emcimbini wenu.

18.verse: Ke ndinezinto zonke nje, ndityebile, ndihluthi, ndizamkele nje kuEpafrodito izinto ezavela kuni: ivumba elimnandi,  umbingelelo owamkelekileyo, okholekileyo kakuhle kuye uThixo.

19.verse: Ke uThixo wam wokwenzelelela konke ukuswela kwenu ngokobutyebi bakhe, ngokozuko olukuKristu Yesu.

20.verse: Kuye ke uThixo, uBawo wethu, malubekho uzuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.

21.verse: Bulisani bonke abangcwele abakuKristu Yesu. Bayanibulisa abazalwana abanam.

22.verse: Bayanibulisa bonke abangcwele, ngokukodwa ke aba bendlu kaKesare.

23.verse: Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani nonke.  Amen.
